questions.question: 1.Which of the following does not show any interference pattern?

explanations.b: Explanation 1 here - Excessively thin films do not show interference because their thickness is negligible compared to the wavelength of light.

questions.question: 2.The main principle used in Interference is _____________

explanations.b: Explanation 1 here - Interference patterns are a result of the superposition of light waves.

questions.question: 3.When Two waves of same amplitude add constructively, the intensity becomes _____________

explanations.c: Explanation 1 here - Constructive interference results in an intensity that is the square of the amplitude, making it four times greater.

questions.question: 4.When Newton's rings interference pattern is viewed from above by means of reflected light , the central spot is -

explanations.a: Explanation 1 here - The central spot is dark due to destructive interference at the center.

questions.question: 5.In Newton's ring experiments , the diameter of dark rings is proportional to

answers.b: Square roots of odd natural numbers

explanations.d: Explanation 1 here - The diameter of dark rings is proportional to the square root of natural numbers.

questions.question: 6.Which phenomenon is observed when light waves bend around obstacles?

explanations.c: Explanation 1 - Diffraction occurs when light bends around an obstacle or passes through a narrow opening, creating interference patterns.

questions.question: 7.What is the relationship between wavelength and frequency of a wave?

explanations.b: Explanation 1 - Wavelength and frequency are inversely proportional as their product equals the speed of the wave.
